thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: You gotta stay here
thread.title_full: You gotta stay here - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: raggedass
title: You gotta stay here
text:
Being located in the Shichahai district. A historical area of Bejing was incredible. A fifteen minute walk in any direction brought you into the shopping, eating or a walk along a couple of lakes.
The lobby of the hotel is like a small museum dedicated to the shadow art puppet performance, which a performance takes place a couple of times per week in the evening, in my opinion a don't miss event.
You will meet a very motivated , knowledgable professional staff who if necessary are capable of performing small miracles.
Room Tip: The room was almost perfect.quiet,spacious, lots of plug in for electronics. A WiFi that worked. Due... See more room tips
